Name: Ayyappan G A
Text:
I received this month only. Invoice copy mentioned one year warranty. But HP warranty show in laptop it's expired this year 7th month.How can claim for warranty?or this is old laptop?Herewith attached warranty photo copy for what it's show in my laptop.

Laptop working is good.Spec is all is correct.my self this laptop is satisfactory. Battery backup is 3 and 1/2 hour.

Name: singaravelan
Review Title: Laptop look is not catchy and overall performance is okay not bad
Text: Battery life is okay and only the look of laptop is disappointing.

Name: Placeholder
Text: Don't buy any product from HP. The customer service is pathetic

Name: Pranjal
Review Title: Good built quality and daily use laptop!
Text:
This is my first laptop and I truly believe I made a good choice!!
I got it for around 41k ish and it's costly because we have semiconductor crisis going on currently, but the laptop performs well, has good battery backup, bright screen and smooth experience and yes charges quick!! I guess it would take it 1hr 30 min approximately and it would last around 5hrs while you are surfing the internet and and more than that if it's not connected to any Internet.
I basically bought it for academic purpose and it fulfills all my needs, and yes I am writing this review after 10days of usage and as of now it does collaborate with all my needs!!

A good product you shall consider!!

Name: Amit kumar
Text:
It help me during lockdown to learn and explore the studying and working.
You can go for it.

Name: shivam chauhan
Text: Good product excellent quality.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Charger is not working exactly after 12 months
Text:
I brought this laptop for my personal use during Feb 2022 and its charger has stopped working on March 2023, exactly after their warranty period. My usage has been very minimal since I use only for personal work purpose roughly around 82 hours total.

Their customer support is in a complete denial mode of resolving the issue pointing that warranty is over.

Also, a lot of fan noise every now and then keeps coming.

Name: Harsh Vyas
Text: Good and Easy to Use

First of all I am writing this after using the product for more than a month. This is a good laptop for day to day usage. Please note that this is not for games however you can play some light games. If you want the best performance install a SSD which will improve the performance drastically. There is no lags or glitches after installing SSD. The battery life is 2 to 3 hours with one full cycle of charge. Of course it depends on your usage. As off now I have not faced any major issues though I am running Windows 11. Built quality is average. Lastly the delivery from Amazon was excellent. Thanks Amazon team. Keep it up. If you are a average user you can blindly go for it with a SSD installed in the device.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review Title: Separate numeric key pad like desktop!
Text: It has given numeric key pad separately in key board. This is very effective for accounts purpose or those who are randomly use numeric data.

Name: Rasaramya.g
Text: Keyboard is not working properly

Name: Amazon Customer
Text: Bought this product only 3 months back. Flickering of monitor started from first month. Now after three months frequency of monitor flickering is too much. I cannot work on this laptop. Its totally useless. Please replace this with a new laptop.

Name: Divyaansh Gupta
Review Title: Good General Purpose Laptop with Decent Build Quality
Text:
Pros
1 Good Specifications
2 Decent Build Quality(Not the Best)
3 Great General Purpose Laptop
4 Speakers and Battery life are Very
Good
5 Good for Multi tasking (8gb ram)
6 Fast Boot time (256gb ssd)

Cons
1 Display Not the Best(But Decent)
2 Laptop hinge looks Weak
3 Not Recommended for Graphic and
Prossessiong intensive tasks(i3
2cores)
4 Poor Webcam Quality

* It does not come with Radeon Graphics
* HDD is 5400rpm

Name: Kannan
Text: Good computer

Name: Amazon Customer
Text: I am using this laptop for last 1 year, some of the keys not working properly.

Name: JV4EVER
Review Title: I don't know why but It's Slow
Text: All is well. Except this laptop is slow.

Name: Sam
Review Title: Good for students and can play games with smooth 30 fps!!! Overall nice laptop.
Text:
Nice laptop for kids having online classes and want to play some games. I would say it might not be the best gaming laptop but in the title it said FHD gaming laptop but now it doesn't. So i was confused but after a few processor speed changes it works really well, In fact i even play games like Fortnite, Valorant and some more with a constant 40-50 fps. So overall it is satisfying. And for the biggest question it has a battery life 5-6 hrs while attending online classes and can handle a game for like an hour.
One small disappointment was it came with a Intel UHD graphics which were a bit low compared to this laptop. Loving it since bought Its been 6 months since bought but no problem till now and its pretty sturdy material too so would suggest buying.

Name: Doctor Sahib
Text:
It's a great general purpose laptop. I got it for 41.3k, and though its original configuration is fine too, I added 8gb additional RAM for 3.2k, so for 44.5k I've got a laptop that's blazingly fast for general use.
I don't use it for gaming, only for office work and as a home computer, and for that it's fantastic. Boot up time is 5-7 sec, shutdown is 2 sec, Windows 10 and MS Office are pre-installed with lifetime validity.
I have a similar HP 15 with the Ryzen 3 and though the specs on that are better on paper, the i3 version seems to be far better in real world performance.
All in all, a great buy.

Update: One month plus of regular use of around 10 hours a day and everything's still as great, no problems at all have come up in this duration.

Name: Su
Text:
Nice stuff, only I have issue with the warranty, technically it should be from the date of purchase so it must be be upto Dec but when checked online it's upto August..
Keeping fingers crossed won't be a issue to extend warranty

Name: Md Wadud Alam
Text: Not for gaming and heavy use. But it's good for student and light work.

Name: Sri
Text:
Reading good comments here, bought this. Been using this since 3 days, and I see slowness, installed only chrome. Chrome doesnt open fast, had to do some diagnostics to improve performance (marginal). I have now scheduled a technician visit, if that doesnt solve, I'm returning.

After writing this review, I see good performance :) not sure what changed. I believe, the OS was downloading stuff and optimising. Have been using this since a week now and no complaints

Name: JJ
Review Title: Good for office and normal use.
Text:
System works smooth with 256,GB SSD and 8gb RAM.
Got Win 10 OEM and MS office Home & student active.
Booting up within 20sec.
Expected Graphic card of 8Gb AMD Radeon.
As it was mentioned in details but came with inbuilt Intel UHD graphic 4gb .. which was a disappointment.
Also expected 2 Usb port and 3.0 port but it has 2 usb 3.0 ports and 1 usb C port.
Haven't used for more than 2 days will update later.

Update after 2 weeks.. After all windows updates ,laptop performance has improved.. Gives a battery ackup of more than 6hrs with heavy use. Full charge within 2hrs.

Name: Amazon Customer
Text:
Received package on time and in good condition. Started installing applications. It fine. No issues found. But I didn't observed a recovery partition. Don't know what to do if OS crashes.
No problems observed while installing applications. Speed good. Backup time not yet tested.

Name: Marshall Jobber
Review Title: Perfect value for what you pay
Text:
It has given me everything at par what I was looking for in laptop as per my requirements, such as compact, light in weight, anti-glare display, perfect combination of system configuration..

One thing I couldn't understand is the delivery date was next day when I checked this on amazon and when I actually bought it next day; unexpectedly delivery date was changed to after a week. In addition, actually it was dispatched after 3 days of placing an order..

Name: Ajaay Shereen
Review Title: Useful for daily usage. Not too useful if you want for gaming
Text:
Two weeks since I got this product delivered. Daily usage is good. SSD makes sure of fast startup and system usage. Additionally the 1 TB HDD is useful for storage. Warranty is updated correctly once you setup. Some bloatware exist as you would expect from any laptop with pre-installed software. Some of the keys are a little hard to press, but not too much. The power and charging indicators at the sides might make people desiring for a better design.

There is no graphic card. While SSD might make game faster along with 8 GB RAM, lack of a dedicated graphic card means it's not that good with games.

All in all, it is a fine one if you want for daily usages or programming/study.

Name: Amazon Customer
Text: Worked pretty good till the warranty period...but now absolutely bad... everyday new problem occurs...

Name: Amitbhai Upadhyay
Review Title: Good laptop for daily normal use. After buying, first check waranty online.
Text: Hp website shows 9 months warranty instead of12 months waranty. It may be second hand product / technical error. I share the issue with hp customer support. They assure me to solve the issue asap. But, Good laptop for daily normal or office use. But front webcam is too poor.

Name: Suhas shekar
Text: Good for money sometimes small glitches happens while using ms office but rest everything is fine. I recommend for this product.

Name: A pal
Text:
Pros :-
1) Good processor speed under load.
2) Ssd performance is great, no slowdowns during windows update.
3) Camera and mic are ok ok.
4) Quite high fan speed due to which less heating issues and better stability at higher clocker rate
5) There is no bluetooth - wifi coexistence issue at 2.4 ghz.
6) Good loudness of the speaker.
7) Screen clarity is nice.
8) Trackpad also working good.
9) No driver issues.

Cons:-
1) Average battery life.
2) Viewing angles are not enough. For, single person, it's good.

Name: Mikey
Text:
I received the laptop yesterday. Windows & MS Office are both preinstalled. The registration activation of MS Office was quite easy. Just a high speed Internet connection is required. I also subscribed to McAfee Anti virus as there was an offer bundled with hp laptops and it cost me just ₹199/- for the first year.
Windows too updated to 11 and the working seems to be fast as the laptop has an 8GB RAM & 512 GB SSD which I believe should suffice for my needs.
Overall a wonderful experience..
Would update in future..

Name: Amazon Customer
Text: No complains … using for last 1year

Name: Avinash J.
Text: Good for very basic wfh activities. In hindsight, I would suggest the same configuration and the buy o365, as outlook is not included. Fan sound can be very loud at times. Like a takeoff. Again, very basic, but does the basic job.

Name: Pramod Bankhele
Text:
Good value for money! Hybrid 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD gives fast booting helps on and off faster! Good standard 8GB RAM gives speed while multitasking and data reading, also it can upgradable to 16GB! Camera is also clear, dual speakers are good while attending online meetings and school lectures but not for watching films or listening music though one can easily attach Bluetooth headphones or speakers! Alexa comes inbuilt and mikes besides camera works superbly!
Negatives are- No fingerprint lock/unlock function, Anti glare makes screen darker while tilting and keyboard is without backlight.
Overall a good laptop for Schooling, working & occasional movie watching!

Name: sunny
Text: Nice laptop, fast, little hang on playing asphaslt 11.

Name: Sam Grey
Text:
Product is awesome just 1500 ra expensive as i was getting same from authorised dealer for rupees 43500 with bag which cost around 1000 rupees so basically laptop alone will cost 42500 and here on Amazon it is selling for around 44000 rupees however I purchased this because I was able to exchange my 9 year old laptop for 8750 rupees that's a steal for me. I paid 34244 rs net.

cons:

JUST 2 USB PORTS, SHOULD HAVE ATLEAST 3 ALSO THERE IS NO GAP BETWEEN THOSE 2 PORTS AND SOMTIMES ITS DIFFICULT TO PLUG TWO DEVICES TOGETHER.

Text: Simply superb! Great performance from the I3 processor and 8 GB of RAM. Display and screen brightness are awesome. Furthermore it has great space from its 1 TB HDD. Overall an exemplary product at an affordable price. Unfortunately the only flaw was the tricky activation of Ms office package.

WRITING THIS REVIEW AFTER USING IT FOR 4 MONTHS

Name: Amazon Customer
Text: HP India is the worst company to buy a laptop from. The laptop stopped working and on reaching out for a resolution, they asked me to factory reset and re-install windows. I did the reset and then they asked me to procure a 32Gb pen drive on my own or pay charges for Windows installation. This was for a product which comes with Windows. Beyond that, I've been redirected multiple times and for 4 days haven't received any communication from the firm. I am being told that it is stuck in e-mail approvals yet there is no call back from the team. Mu brother is unable to use the laptop for his exams and HP is taking no responsibility. Terrible Service from the team and would recommend you buy from the nearest store and not from Amazon and that you buy any brand other than HP.

I called Amazon customer care but concern asked me to talk to HP. But the one who sold it (Amazon) did not bother to check what product is getting deliver is really disappointing. I will close down my Amazon Business Account

Name: Zampa
Text:
The specs are great. SSD, big RAM. Works good overall. 9/10.
The viewing angles aren't great though. You would not want more than one person watching a movie on this screen.

Name: Vishal
Text:
I ordered it during sale at 41K . Unfortunately could not returned it during return window.

Its not at all worth the price. It's terribly slow. Don't go by the configuration.

I am a Dell and Apple fan, bought HP first time. My 7 year old Dell laptop has much more faster performance and good built. It was bought at same range 40K

Only good things about this one are loud & clear sound quality and its light weight.
All other things bad.

Would not recommend it.

Text:
Hi All,

I have recently purchased this laptop, and on the very next day, it is getting hanged, unable to run the apps properly. Very slow processer. Worst quality. And the worst part is customer services are not even helping they are just asking to remove the Temporary file. The funny part is, how much temporary file data will be there for 10-15 days old laptop :)

The HP Laptop technical support team says that it doesn't support Memory: 4/8 GB DDR4-2666 MHz RAM with Windows 10, HP is requesting me to upgrade to 8 GB RAM or 16 GB RAM to work the laptop properly. requesting you not buy this laptop. I asked to return but nothing has happened. Please please do not buy this product.

Thanks,

Text:
At this price range it is a good laptop. After 15 days of use i found-
Pros: 1) Boot up and shut down super fast under 5sec.
2) Thin and light. Easy to carry.
3) Windows 11 out of the box.
4) Lifetime MS Office.
5) Sound is adequate.
Cons:
1) Built quality is just so so.
2) Battery backup 3-4 hrs of contineous use with wi- fi.
3) Display could have been better.
4) Somtimes you can hear fan noise.

Name: Ramesh Ananthasayanam
Review Title: Good Product for home/Office non- gaming general use
Text:
Writing this review after using the product for 2 weeks. Laptop was delivered the same day it was ordered and the exchange formalities too went off smoothly.
Laptop performance:
Speed: It is good for all Microsoft office functions which are the basic ones. It came loaded with Windows10 and was updated automatically to Windows 11. Having 8 GB RAM helps in multi tasking with multiple desktops and tabs.
Display is impressive and works best if the Chrome is preset to 90% zoom.
Sound and camera works well for Skype and Hangouts
Cons: Skype doesn't work with Windows 11 and has to be downloaded separately.
No keyboard indication of Num lock which is required often.
Overall a good buy.

Name: Sree
Text:
Bought it for my son's online school classes. Really nice one. Pretty easy to setup and install all pre loaded features/softwares.
Works on Windows 10 / MS Office Student edition

Text: Quick Boot, Light weight, good battery backup.

Name: Sahad
Review Title: There is no problem at all except the sound of fan and the light of the screen
Text: I am using this laptop for conventional purposes like Microsoft Office, Photoshop etc.... For these things the laptop is perfect. But the sound of the cooling fan is little bit disgusting. The screen is not also that perfect. If you are watching a film in the lappy alone, then it's totally fine. But more than one person can't watch it. Other than that the laptop is good
